vaccine.title: 1. Modified Push-Up on Yoga Block
vaccine.body: Expert says do push-ups with their kneesdirectly on the floor. 'Expert likes thesurface to be elevated, so you're kneelingbut are 6 to 10 inches off the ground. It’s little more similar to the form of a proper push-up, so when we eventually transition from knees to toes it’s a lot easier.'
